statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_documents LIMIT 10;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT AVG(document_id) AS avg_document_id FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT MAX(upload_date) AS max_upload_date FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT MIN(document_id) AS min_document_id FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT document_name, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT document_type, AVG(document_id) AS avg_document_id FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT YEAR(upload_date) AS upload_year, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY YEAR(upload_date);
SELECT document_name, DATE_FORMAT(upload_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_type, ROUND(AVG(document_id), 2) AS avg_document_id FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(document_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, DATE(upload_date) AS upload_date_only FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM upload_date) AS upload_month FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'policy' AND upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'report' ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT DISTINCT document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY document_name ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(document_id) AS avg_document_id FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE LENGTH(document_name) > 20;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type LIKE 'policy%';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%security%' AND document_type = 'policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE YEAR(upload_date) = 2022;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE YEAR(upload_date) = 2022 AND MONTH(upload_date) = 6 ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type IN ('policy','report') ORDER BY document_type ASC, upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name IN ('Data Security Policy','Audit Report');
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id IN (1, 5, 10, 15, 20);
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE YEAR(upload_date) = YEAR(CURDATE());
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name REGEXP '^[0-9]';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action FROM audit_trails;
SELECT audit_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'VIEW';
SELECT audit_id, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT audit_id, action, details FROM audit_trails WHERE details LIKE '%error%';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Procedure' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date < '2021-01-01' AND document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action, details FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type IN ('Policy', 'Procedure');
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT audit_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name = 'security_policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date, document_content FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy'
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM audit_trails
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'View'
SELECT audit_id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents JOIN audit_trails ON compliance_documents.document_id = audit_trails.audit_id
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type LIKE '%Procedure%'
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action IN ('Create', 'Update')
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%Privacy%' OR document_name LIKE '%Policy%'
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE upload_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE details IS NOT NULL
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY upload_date ASC
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents LEFT JOIN audit_trails ON compliance_documents.document_id = audit_trails.audit_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_documents
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'Delete'
SELECT AVG(upload_date) FROM compliance_documents
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM audit_trails
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_trails ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT id, uploaded_by, uploaded_date FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT action, action_date FROM audit_trails;
SELECT user_id, document_id FROM audit_trails;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues;
SELECT issue_description, reported_by, reported_date FROM compliance_issues;
SELECT id, resolved FROM compliance_issues;
SELECT document_name, uploaded_by, uploaded_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT action, action_date, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT issue_description, reported_date FROM compliance_issues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'Update';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE reported_by = 'Alice' OR reported_by = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, uploaded_by, uploaded_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE uploaded_by='John Doe';
SELECT id, document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents WHERE uploaded_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type='Policy' AND uploaded_by='Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE uploaded_by LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type IN ('Policy', 'Procedure');
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT action, action_date, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE action='View';
SELECT action, action_date, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE action='Edit' AND action_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id=123 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE document_id=456;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues;
SELECT issue_description, reported_by, reported_date FROM compliance_issues WHERE resolved=FALSE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, issue_description FROM compliance_issues WHERE reported_by='Alice';
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE issue_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE reported_by='Bob' AND resolved=TRUE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE reported_by IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT * FROM document;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document WHERE document_type='Invoice';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM document WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE performed_by='John Doe';
SELECT audit_id, action_type FROM audit_trail WHERE performed_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_act WHERE enactment_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT act_id, act_name, compliance_deadline FROM regulatory_act WHERE act_name LIKE '%GDPR%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_record WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT document_id, act_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_record WHERE compliance_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM document INNER JOIN compliance_record ON document.document_id = compliance_record.document_id;

SELECT document.document_id, document.document_name, regulatory_act.act_name FROM document INNER JOIN compliance_record ON document.document_id = compliance_record.document_id INNER JOIN regulatory_act ON compliance_record.act_id = regulatory_act.act_id;
SELECT document_id, document_name, action_description FROM document LEFT JOIN audit_trail ON document.document_id = audit_trail.document_id;

SELECT document_id, document_name, act_name FROM document RIGHT JOIN compliance_record ON document.document_id = compliance_record.document_id INNER JOIN regulatory_act ON compliance_record.act_id = regulatory_act.act_id;
SELECT document_name, compliance_date FROM document LEFT JOIN compliance_record ON document.document_id = compliance_record.document_id WHERE compliance_status=false;
SELECT act_name, act_description, enactment_date, compliance_date FROM regulatory_act LEFT JOIN compliance_record ON regulatory_act.act_id = compliance_record.act_id WHERE compliance_status=false;

SELECT document.document_id, document.document_name, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM document INNER JOIN audit_trail ON document.document_id = audit_trail.document_id GROUP BY document.document_id, document.document_name;
SELECT act_name, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM regulatory_act INNER JOIN compliance_record ON regulatory_act.act_id = compliance_record.act_id GROUP BY act_name;
SELECT document_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_created_at FROM document GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT audit_id, MAX(performed_at) AS latest_performed_at FROM audit_trail GROUP BY audit_id;
SELECT act_id, MIN(enactment_date) AS earliest_enactment_date FROM regulatory_act GROUP BY act_id;
SELECT * FROM document WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM document JOIN audit_trail ON document.document_id = audit_trail.document_id WHERE performed_by = 'Admin';
SELECT document_name, audit_id FROM document JOIN audit_trail ON document.document_id = audit_trail.document_id WHERE action_type = 'Update' AND performed_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT d.document_id, d.document_name, a.action_description FROM document d JOIN audit_trail a ON d.document_id = a.document_id JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id WHERE c.compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_act WHERE enactment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT a.act_name, c.compliance_date FROM regulatory_act a JOIN compliance_record c ON a.act_id = c.act_id WHERE compliance_status = false;

SELECT d.document_name, a.act_name FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id JOIN regulatory_act a ON c.act_id = a.act_id WHERE c.compliance_status = false AND c.compliance_date <= '2022-08-31';

SELECT d.document_name, r.act_name, r.compliance_date FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id JOIN regulatory_act r ON c.act_id = r.act_id WHERE c.compliance_status = true AND r.enactment_date <= '2022-07-01';
SELECT DISTINCT d.document_type FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id WHERE d.document_type IN ('Policy', 'Procedure');

SELECT d.document_name, r.act_description FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id JOIN regulatory_act r ON c.act_id = r.act_id WHERE c.compliance_status = true AND r.compliance_deadline >= '2022-09-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM document;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_act_records FROM regulatory_act;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_audit_records FROM audit_trail WHERE performed_at <= '2022-10-31';
SELECT AVG(c.compliance_status::int) AS avg_compliance_score FROM compliance_record c;
SELECT MAX(r.enactment_date) AS latest_enactment_date FROM regulatory_act r;
SELECT MIN(audit_id) AS first_audit_id FROM audit_trail;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_trail GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT d.document_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compliance_records FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id GROUP BY d.document_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;

SELECT d.document_name, r.act_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compliance_records FROM document d JOIN compliance_record c ON d.document_id = c.document_id JOIN regulatory_act r ON c.act_id = r.act_id GROUP BY d.document_id, r.act_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(c.compliance_date, r.enactment_date))) AS avg_compliance_time FROM compliance_record c JOIN regulatory_act r ON c.act_id = r.act_id WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documentation;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documentation;
SELECT document_name, document_description FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT action, action_date FROM audit_trail;
SELECT user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'update';
SELECT * FROM user_info;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_info;
SELECT user_name, department FROM user_info WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT dept_name, location FROM department;
SELECT dept_name, dept_head FROM department WHERE dept_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_access;
SELECT user_id, department_id FROM user_access WHERE access_level = 'write';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_access WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM department WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE granted_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_type = 'report';
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM compliance_documentation WHERE document_type = 'policy' AND document_owner = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_name, document_date, user_name FROM compliance_documentation JOIN user_info ON compliance_documentation.document_owner = user_info.user_id;
SELECT user_name, user_role, department FROM user_info WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' AND action != 'delete' ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT department_id, access_level, granted_date FROM user_access WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT document_name, document_date, user_name, dept_name FROM compliance_documentation JOIN user_info ON compliance_documentation.document_owner = user_info.user_id JOIN department ON user_info.department = department.dept_id;
SELECT user_name, user_role, dept_name, access_level FROM user_info JOIN department ON user_info.department = department.dept_id JOIN user_access ON user_info.user_id = user_access.user_id;

SELECT user_name, user_role, document_name, action FROM user_info JOIN audit_trail ON user_info.user_id = audit_trail.user_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON audit_trail.document_id = compliance_documentation.document_id WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT user_name, user_role, dept_name, document_name FROM user_info JOIN department ON user_info.department = department.dept_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner AND department.dept_head = user_info.user_id;
SELECT dept_name, location, user_name FROM department JOIN user_info ON department.dept_head = user_info.user_id;
SELECT dept_name, document_name FROM department JOIN compliance_documentation ON department.dept_head = compliance_documentation.document_owner;

SELECT department_id, user_role, document_name FROM user_info JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner JOIN user_access ON user_info.user_id = user_access.user_id WHERE access_level = 'write';

SELECT user_name, document_name, action FROM user_info JOIN audit_trail ON user_info.user_id = audit_trail.user_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON audit_trail.document_id = compliance_documentation.document_id WHERE action = 'update';

SELECT dept_name, user_name, document_name FROM department JOIN user_access ON department.dept_id = user_access.department_id JOIN user_info ON user_access.user_id = user_info.user_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner;
SELECT user_name, user_role, action, action_date FROM user_info JOIN audit_trail ON user_info.user_id = audit_trail.user_id WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT dept_name, user_name, document_name, action FROM department JOIN user_info ON department.dept_head = user_info.user_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner JOIN audit_trail ON compliance_documentation.document_id = audit_trail.document_id;

SELECT user_name, user_role, dept_name, location, document_name FROM user_info JOIN department ON user_info.department = department.dept_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner;

SELECT user_name, user_role, dept_name, access_level, granted_date FROM user_info JOIN department ON user_info.department = department.dept_id JOIN user_access ON user_info.user_id = user_access.user_id;

SELECT dept_name, user_name, document_name, action FROM department JOIN user_info ON department.dept_head = user_info.user_id JOIN compliance_documentation ON user_info.user_id = compliance_documentation.document_owner JOIN audit_trail ON compliance_documentation.document_id = audit_trail.document_id WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
